title: What happens with left over championship jewels?
body: so i only bought one icon ontop of the regular icon bought for ip and upgraded both to max tier but i didnt want any other icons, whats gonna happen with my 94left over jewels?

replies.body:
According to [this post](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/226192107-2016-Worlds-Guide-Crafting-championship-skins-and-more-), we should have started removing these materials today, and as far as I know, nothing else can be done with them.

Let me know if you have any questions.

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=ExGW8WGO,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-11-08T02:41:55.013+0000)
>
> According to [this post](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/226192107-2016-Worlds-Guide-Crafting-championship-skins-and-more-), we should have started removing these materials today, and as far as I know, nothing else can be done with them.
> 
> Let me know if you have any questions.

I'm glad to see them go, but maybe if we see this next time we can do something else with them. Was up over 400 because of all the chests I used. On one hand, nice. On the other hand... sad see that many just "poof".
